title: Server Schema
description: This object contains server information of Pulsar broker. This object contains additional information not possible to represent within the core AsyncAPI specification.

time.description: Time given in Minutes. `0` = Disable message retention (by default)

size.description: Size given in MegaBytes. `0` = Disable message retention (by default)

deduplication.description: Whether deduplication of events is enabled or not.

bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, 'latest' MUST be assumed.
